SELECT REPLY_CONTENT, MEMBER_NAME AS "memberName", PROFILE_IMG AS "profileImg",
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CAST(REPLY_TIME AS DATE) < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CAST(REPLY_TIME AS DATE)) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - CAST(REPLY_TIME AS DATE) < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CAST(REPLY_TIME AS DATE)) * 24 * 60) || '분 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - CAST(REPLY_TIME AS DATE) < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CAST(REPLY_TIME AS DATE)) * 24) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(REPLY_TIME, 'YYYY.MM.DD') END REPLY_TIME
FROM REPLY JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE POST_NO = #{value} AND REPLY_DELETE = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY VALUES(SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL), #{replyContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{postNo}, #{memberNo}
